testcase.name: User should be able to sign up
testcase.system-out: Given Launch browser and navigate to AutomationTester url...................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed When Click on Signup button.................................................passed Then Verify new sign up is visible..........................................passed And Enter name and email address............................................passed And Click 'Signup' button...................................................passed And Finally i close the browserrr...........................................passed

testcase.name: User should be able to sign up and register new user
testcase.system-out: Given Launch browser and navigate to AutomationTester url...................passed When Click on Signup button.................................................passed And Enter name and email address............................................passed And Click 'Signup' button...................................................passed And Fill details: Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of birth...............passed And Select checkbox 'Sign up for our newsletter!'...........................passed And Select checkbox 'Receive special offers from our partners!'.............passed And Fill details: First name, Last name, Company, Address, Address2, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number.passed And Click 'Create Account button'...........................................passed

testcase.name: Login user with incorrect email and password
testcase.system-out: Given Launch browser and navigate to AutomationTester url...................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed When Click on Signup button.................................................passed Then Verify 'Login to your account' is visible..............................passed And Enter correct email address and password................................passed And Clicks 'login' button...................................................passed And Finally i close the browserrr...........................................passed
